message: One way to help during this tragic time. Blood donations are needed to replenish O negative after this terrible trauma.

data.description:
As doctors continue to treat victims of the mass shooting at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School, there is a heightened need for the O negative blood type, according to OneBlood.
The organization says immediate blood needs have been met, but there is...
data.title: How to Donate Blood to Stoneman Douglas Shooting Victims
